Light's Wrath deals an additional {1}% damage per ally affected by your Atonement.

After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to {1}% health, based on your healing done during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for {2} min.
Brings a dead ally back to life with {1}% health and mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.

Prayer of Healing has a {1}% chance to apply a {2} second Renew to allies it heals.
For every {1} sec that you do not cast Holy Nova, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by {2}% and its healing is increased by {3}%. This effect can stack up to {4} times.

Increases your Leech by {1}%.

Attack the enemy's soul with a surge of Shadow energy, dealing {1} Shadow damage and increasing your spell damage to the target by {2}% for {3} sec.

While channeling Mind Sear, your Vampiric Touch and Shadow Word: Pain on all targets deals damage {2}% faster.

Your Spirit of Redemption is now an active ability with a {1} minute cooldown, but the duration is reduced by {2} sec and you will no longer enter Spirit of Redemption upon dying.
